title: Dr Death
overview: Dr. Death is an American true crime drama anthology television series created by Patrick Macmanus, based on the podcast of the same name. Â Season 1 dramatizes the story of Christopher Duntsch, an American neurosurgeon convicted after permanently mutilating his patients, killing two of them. Season 2 will dramatize the story of convicted Swiss-Italian surgeon and medical researcher Paolo Macchiarini.
